questions.question: If R is the radius of the atom in a SCP unit cell, then what is the edge length?

explanations.c: Two radii of atoms make up an edge

questions.question: If R is the radius of the atom in a BCC unit cell, then what is roughly the edge length?

explanations.a: Four radii make up the diagonal of the cube

questions.question: If R is the radius of the atom in a FCC unit cell, then what is roughly the edge length?

explanations.c: Four radii make up the diagonal of one face

questions.question: If R is the radius of the atom in a HCP unit cell, then what is roughly the edge length of a hexagon?

explanations.d: Two radii make up one edge of the hexagon
